# udoma_report_entrypoint (Resource)

Resource represents an entrypoint for a report execution



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_location` (String) The location of the entrypoint in the app
- `label` (Map of String) The label for the entrypoint, localized
- `report_definition_ref` (String) The reference to the report definition

### Optional

- `icon` (String) The icon for the entrypoint
- `quick_execute` (Boolean) Whether the report should be executed immediately

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (Number) The date and time the report entrypoint was created
- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the report entrypoint
- `last_updated` (String)
- `updated_at` (Number) The date and time the report entrypoint was last modified
